name: training
description: Sales data used to train the model
notes: Excludes any PINs with multiple cards, therefore unit of observation is PIN

name: assessment
description: Universe of properties that need assessed values
notes: Card-level, rather than PIN-level

name: complex_id
description: Programmatically created townhome complex IDs
notes: Purpose is to assign townhomes in the same "complex" the same value. Only run as-needed i.e. as little as possible

name: land_site_rate
description: Site-specific flat land values provided by Valuations
notes: Applies to class 210 and 295 properties only

name: land_nbhd_rate
description: Neighborhood-level land rates (per sqft) provided by Valuations
notes: Applies to all properties (except those with a PIN-specific flat value)

name: hie
description: HIE data used to build training and assessment data, used for report generation
notes: A complete retrieval of ccao.hie

name: char
description: Two years of characteristics data for the entire residential assessment set for report generation
notes: Contains data for modeling year and one year prior

name: parameter_search
description: Tidymodels tuning output from cross-validation
notes: Each row is the result from one fold assessment from one iteration

name: parameter_raw
description: Raw, nested Tidymodels tuning output
notes: Not useful in Athena but needed to make models reproducible

name: parameter_final
description: Chosen set of hyperparameters for each run
notes: As chosen by tune::select_best() if using CV, otherwise the default set of hyperparameters specified in params.yaml (model.hyperparameter.default)

name: parameter_range
description: Range of hyperparameters searched during CV tuning
notes: As specified in params.yaml (model.hyperparameter.range)

name: test_card
description: Test set predictions at the card level
notes: Only includes the minimal variables necessary to perform evaluation

name: workflow_fit
description: Trained LightGBM model object + Tidymodels specification
notes: Can be loaded with lightsnip::lgbm_load() to produce predictions using new data

name: workflow_recipe
description: Trained Tidymodels recipe object used for data preprocessing
notes: Can be used to prepare new data in the same way as the original model training

name: assessment_card
description: Assessment results at the card level AKA raw model output
notes: Also includes card-level characteristics. Multi-card PINs will have more than one row. NOTE: Each run adds new partitions to S3 which must be added via a Glue crawler

name: assessment_pin
description: Assessment results at the PIN level AKA aggregated and cleaned
notes: Aggregation depends on PIN specifics, see assess script for details. Includes PIN-level stats like YoY % changes, land, sales, etc. NOTE: Each run adds new partitions to S3 which must be added via a Glue crawler

name: performance_test
primary_key: year, run_id, stage, geography_type, geography_id, by_class, class
description: Peformance metrics (optionally) broken out by class for different levels of geography
notes: Test set includes the most recent 10% of sales

name: performance_test_linear
primary_key: year, run_id, stage, geography_type, geography_id, by_class, class
description: Peformance metrics (optionally) broken out by class for different levels of geography
notes: Test set performance stats using a linear baseline model

name: performance_assessment
primary_key: year, run_id, stage, geography_type, geography_id, by_class, class
description: Peformance metrics (optionally) broken out by class for different levels of geography
notes: Assessment set uses the prior year sales to compare to the assessed value

name: performance_quantile_test
primary_key: year, run_id, stage, geography_type, geography_id, by_class, class, quantile
description: Performance metrics by quantile within class and geography
notes: Test set includes the most recent 10% of sales

name: performance_quantile_test_linear
primary_key: year, run_id, stage, geography_type, geography_id, by_class, class, quantile
description: Performance metrics by quantile within class and geography
notes: Test set performance stats using a linear baseline model

name: performance_quantile_assessment
primary_key: year, run_id, stage, geography_type, geography_id, by_class, class, quantile
description: Performance metrics by quantile within class and geography
notes: Assessment set uses the prior year sales to compare to the assessed value

name: shap
description: SHAP values for each feature for each card in the assessment data
notes: NOTE: Each run adds new partitions to S3 which must be added via a Glue crawler

name: feature_importance
description: Feature importance values (gain, cover, and frequency) for the run

name: report_performance
description: Rendered Quarto doc with model performance statistics

name: report_pin
description: Rendered Quarto doc for individual PINs

name: metadata
description: Information about each run, including parameters, run ID, git info, etc.

name: timing
description: Parquet files for each stage containing the stage time elapsed
notes: Converted into a one-row data frame in the finalize stage

name: timing
description: Finalized time elapsed for each stage of the run
notes: Each row represents one run, while columns represent the stages
